titles.title: A bill to clarify the treatment of the Centennial Bridge, Rock Island, Illinois, under title 23, United States Code, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Baucus without amendment. With written report No. 103-369.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 613.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote. (consideration: CR 9/22/94 S13316)

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/18/1993--Introduced. Provides that the Federal participation agreement for the Centennial Bridge, Rock Island, Illinois, shall be treated as if such agreement had been entered into before the effective date of title I of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 and may be modified accordingly.
